card.text: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life. Basic landcycling {1}{B}

card.name: Ancient Ziggurat
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

card.name: Apocalypse Hydra
card.text: Apocalypse Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, it enters the battlefield with an additional X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Apocalypse Hydra: Apocalypse Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Armillary Sphere
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying, first strike, and vigilance.

card.text: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Blood Tyrant
card.text: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, each player loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Tyrant for each 1 life lost this way. Whenever a player loses the game, put five +1/+1 counters on Blood Tyrant.

card.name: Bloodhall Ooze
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.
